job.title: Corporate Recruiter
job.description: pWhatfix is looking for a stellar strongCorporate Recruiterstrong to join our Talent Acquisition team in North Americanbsp We are growing quickly and our hiring in North America is set to grow exponentiallynbspppnbspppstrongWho are westrongppWhatfix is the 1 Digital Adoption Platform DAP for Enterprises We are changing the way Enterprises train and support their endusers on Applications We provide companies with a SaaS platform that accelerates their employees learning of new applications by giving them guided tutorials in the applicationnbsp The platform also provides continuous ondemand support for endusers again within the application in a guided mannernbspppThe product helps to accelerate product adoption and is redefining the way companies onboard train and provide support to users Over 100 Fortune 1000 enterprises worldwide trust Whatfix to reduce the timetovalue of business applications and improve users productivity and performanceppWe are looking for exceptionally talented and motivated individuals to help us build the worlds best software at scale for thousands of clients Join us as we reinvent the product adoption cycleppnbspppstrongWhat sets us apart from the reststrongpulli140million in funding most recently a 90mm Series D from investors like Sequoia Capital SoftBank Stellaris Cisco and Eight RoadsliliWith over 100 of the Fortune 1000 already onboard as customers Whatfix has been named among the top 20 B2B tech companies alongside the likes of Adobe PayPal and CiscoliliWhatfix is on pace to grow over 100 this year Our most recent quarters had exponential sales growth  Q1 21 had 24x the sales from Q1 20 and Q2 21 had 26x the sales from Q2 20liliGartner and Everest Research recognize Whatfix as a Global Market Leader in the digital adoption spaceliliCustomer rating of 47 on platforms like G2 Crowd amp Gartner Peer InsightsliliHustle Mode ON is something we live bynbspliulpnbspppstrongAbout the RolestrongpulliWhatfix is growing quickly and as a result we are looking to grow our talent acquisition team in North AmericanbspliliReporting to the Lead GotoMarket Recruiter the Corporate Recruiter will work closely with the leaders of our GTM functions such as Marketing Sales amp Business Development Account Management Sales Engineering and Customer Success to build recruiting strategies and execute upon themnbspYou should be comfortable operating as a fullcycle individual contributor from sourcing to offer negotiationliliDuties and Responsibilities liliPartner with hiring managers business unit heads and HRTA team to recruit and hire the best talent in marketliliManage the fullcycle recruiting process for specific GTM roles in North AmericaliliCollaborate with Hiring Managers across departments like Marketing Account Management Sales amp Business Development Sales Engineering and Customer Success to define role requirements interview processes hiring criteria and to negotiate offersnbspnbspliliCreate unique and robust search strategies to identify and attract the best talentliliDevelop innovative ways to raise the bar on how Whatfix recruits talentliliLead calibration sessions with hiring managers and business unit leaders during the interview process incorporating feedback into the search on an interactive basisliliBalance providing a high touch experience throughout the entire recruiting process with both internal stakeholders and candidates while continuously keeping the pipeline active and meeting your hiring goalsliliUse data and metrics reporting to drive continuous process and strategy improvementliliCollaborate in the development of strategies that influence and attract the right talent to join Whatfix at the right timeliulpnbspppstrongQualificationsstrongpulli3 years of experience recruiting bestinmarket talent for a fastpaced high growth technology companyliliPrevious experience recruiting for Sales Partnership Customer Success Marketing Tech roles and related functions is highly preferredliliStrong stakeholder management skills  ability to manage competing priorities across different hiring levelsliliAbility to prioritize between multiple jobs and competing prioritiesliliStrong client focus and commitment to continuous improvementliliStrong research skillsliliSelfdirected and proactiveliliHigh Emotional Quotient EQ and ability to navigate nuanceliliAbility to execute innovative sourcing strategiesliliAbility to learn and leverage stellar negotiation skillsliliProven track record and success recruiting in a technology product companyliliModel the behaviors of a true team player and be a guardian of the Whatfix cultureliliDetailoriented and comfortable using applicant tracking systems like RecruiterboxliliAbility to find humor in the most mundane daysliliBSBA degree preferredliliExperience recruiting within the Enterprise Software sector preferredliliIndustry knowledge in Software Web 20 SaaS  Cloud Startups etc is preferredliulpnbspppstrongPerks  BenefitsstrongpulliUnlimited PTO policyliliMedical Dental and Vision coveragelili401 K PlanliliFree parking
